text: I was a true customer before . id always get the butter chicken ,rice, naan bread. At first it was always ready on time when we would call for pick up but the past 4 times we have been told it would be ready in 15 -20 mins and we have had to wait about 45- 1 hour ! It very annoying how they are always behind so for that reason we will not be returning.
This is the best indian food i have ever had period. Generous portions great flavour. If you go try the somosas with mint chutney

When the lunch buffet can be rated 5 stars, you know you have found a treasure. Their naan is superb, and the goat curry is simply one of the best dishes I have had at an Indian restaurant in Calgary.
